metadata.title: CVE-2024-40930 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: cfg80211: validate HE operation element parsingValidate that the HE operation element has the correctlength before parsing it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
